definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Among grains, only rice is consumed in great quantities than wheat. (Todd Korol/Reuters)
sentences.chinese: 在所有穀物裏，僅有大米的消耗量比小麥多。

sentences.english: Third, reduce the consumption of steam trap their own steam .
sentences.chinese: 第三，降低蒸汽疏水閥自身的蒸汽消耗量。

sentences.english: Women reported 7-day household food expenditure and consumption on both occasions.
sentences.chinese: 婦女報告了兩種情況下7天家庭的糧食開支和消耗量。

sentences.english: Which two fuels provide about one-half of all the energy used in Canada?
sentences.chinese: 哪兩種燃料提供的能量佔加拿大總消耗量的一半？

sentences.english: For example, with the tyres calculation formula kilometres to measure the average consumption tires.
sentences.chinese: 以輪胎爲例，計算公式百公里輪胎平均消耗量度。

sentences.english: Since its life is especially short, the consumption of cooling pipe is very high.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻管的使用壽命非常短，消耗量相當大。

sentences.english: US per-capita energy consumption is 250 times greater than in many poor countries.
sentences.chinese: 美國的人均能源消耗量是很多窮國的250倍。

sentences.english: Benzine and oily wastage up to mark.
sentences.chinese: 汽油與油消耗量都達到標準。

sentences.english: annual consumption of sugar is around 4m tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 每年糖的消耗量將近4百噸。

sentences.english: About 80% of China's annual gold consumption goes toward making jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 中國黃金年消耗量的80%用於製作珠寶首飾。

sentences.english: Therefore, this method can be popularized to other laboratory consuming large silver nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 該工藝可推廣到硝酸銀消耗量較大的其他化驗室。

sentences.english: I do believe that high coffee consumption correlates with decreased risk of depression.
sentences.chinese: 我相信咖啡高消耗量與降低抑鬱風險有關係。

sentences.english: Water consumption decreased during the winter.
sentences.chinese: 冬季期間水消耗量減少。

sentences.english: Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance mana costs reduced.
sentences.chinese: 祕法智慧和祕法光輝的法力消耗量降低。

sentences.english: The risk of nutrient depletions is greatly enhanced during pregnancy and lactation.
sentences.chinese: 婦女在懷孕期間和泌乳期間的營養消耗量驚人。

definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
